00020 
00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.Utils;
00026 using Niry.Network;
00027 
00028 using NyFolder;
00029 using NyFolder.Utils;
00030 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00031 
00032 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00034     public class FileReceiver : Protocol.FileInfo {
00035         // ============================================
00036         // PUBLIC Events
00037         // ============================================
00039         public BlankEventHandler EndAbort = null;
00040 
00041         // ============================================
00042         // PRIVATE Members
00043         // ============================================
00044         private BinaryWriter binaryWriter = null;
00045         private bool saveOnExit = true;
00046         private long fileSaved = 0;
00047 
00048         // ============================================
00049         // PUBLIC Constructors
00050         // ============================================
00052         public FileReceiver (ulong id) : base(id) {
00053         }
00054 
00056         public FileReceiver (ulong id, PeerSocket peer, 
00057                              string fileName, string saveAs) :
00058             base(id, peer, saveAs, fileName)
00059         {
00060         }
00061 
00063         ~FileReceiver() {
00064             if (saveOnExit == true) Save();
00065         }
00066 
00067         // ============================================
00068         // PUBLIC Methods
00069         // ============================================
00071         public void Init (XmlRequest xml) {
00072             Size = long.Parse((string) xml.Attributes["size"]);
00073             Name = (string) xml.Attributes["name"];
00074 
00075             // Create Null File and Open Binary Stream
00076             FileStream stream = FileUtils.CreateNullFile(MyDiskName, Size);
00077             binaryWriter = new BinaryWriter(stream);
00078         }
00079 
00081         public void AddPart (XmlRequest xml) {
00082             try {
00083                 int part = int.Parse((string) xml.Attributes["part"]);
00084                 byte[] data = Convert.FromBase64String(xml.BodyText);
00085                 fileSaved += data.Length;
00086 
00087                 // Seek to Offset & Write Data
00088                 binaryWriter.Seek((int)(part * FileSender.ChunkSize), SeekOrigin.Begin);
00089                 binaryWriter.Write(data, 0, data.Length);
00090             } catch (Exception e) {
00091                 Debug.Log("FileReceiver.AddPart(): {0}", e.Message);
00092             }
00093         }
00094 
00096         public override void Abort() {
00097             Abort(null);
00098         }
00099         
00101         public void Abort (string msgerror) {
00102             Save();
00103             saveOnExit = false;
00104             AbortRecvFile(msgerror);
00105 
00106             if (EndAbort != null) EndAbort(this);
00107         }
00108 
00110         public void Save() {
00111             if (binaryWriter != null) {
00112                 binaryWriter.Flush();
00113                 binaryWriter.Close();
00114                 binaryWriter = null;
00115             }
00116         }
00117 
00118         // ============================================
00119         // PRIVATE Methods
00120         // ============================================
00123         private void AbortRecvFile (string msgerror) {
00124             // XmlRequest
00125             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00126             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "recv-abort";
00127             if (msgerror != null)
00128                 xmlRequest.BodyText = "Sending Error: " + msgerror;
00129             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "file");
00130             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("id", Id);
00131 
00132             // Send To Peer
00133             if (Peer != null) Peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00134         }
00135 
00136         // ============================================
00137         // PUBLIC Properties
00138         // ============================================
00140         public long SavedSize {
00141             get { return(this.fileSaved); }
00142         }
00143 
00145         public int ReceivedPercent {
00146             get { return((int) ((SavedSize / (double) Size) * 100)); }
00147         }
00148     }
00149 }
